dc_description_s: This study is an exit poll of the 40th Ontario General Election, performed on October 6, 2011. An online survey tool was used to examine voter attitudes and preferences in the 40th Ontario general election. Respondents provide information regarding government and party leader preferences, issues that affected the election campaign, as well as priorities for the new government. This study includes tabulated aggregate statistics that analyze significant issues in the dataset against key socioeconomic characteristics. This study has a sample of 8,893 respondents.
